thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and good value
thread.title_full: Comfortable and good value - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Ze_Abron
title: Comfortable and good value
text: Great hotel, large comfortable rooms, good furniture, comfy bed, good (but not excellent) design throughout. Staff are VERY good, the room service was good value, very well presented, and enjoyable. The car service to the airport was pleasurable. Overall, I would rate is 5 star were it not for the utterly wonderful Park Hyatt nearby that is just better in all possible ways!
